did.unittitle: Communist Party, New York State Committee Miscellaneous Documents

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Communist Party, New York State Committee

did.abstract: Miscellaneous documents of the New York State Committee of the Communist Party.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of miscellaneous documents of the New York State Committee of the Communist Party. Included are correspondence, reports, and draft resolutions.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Communist Party, New York State Committee Miscellaneous Documents #5465. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
